name: 2010/10/10 Lunch
description: This 2010/10/10 Lunch recipe is perfect for those seeking healthy, high-sodium, low-sugar options. Featuring Adlai Rice, Amapalaya (Bitter Gourd), and Belly, this dish is a nutritious choice for anyone following Healthyfied or Healthified Recipes diets.

recipeInstructions.text: Finely dice the Red Onion. Mince the Garlic. Slice the Amapalaya (Bitter Gourd) into thin strips. Cut the Belly into bite-size pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the Adlai Rice under cold water until the water runs clear.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the Adlai Rice according to package instructions until tender, then set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan over medium heat, saut√© the Red Onion and Garlic until soft, about 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Add the sliced Amapalaya (Bitter Gourd) to the pan and cook until it begins to soften, about 8 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Season the Belly pieces with Salt and Pepper, then add to the pan. Cook until the meat is browned and fully cooked, around 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the cooked meat and vegetables with the Adlai Rice. Stir everything together until well combined. Adjust seasoning with Salt and Pepper, if necessary.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7
